title: About Rudraksh Gupta
summary: I am a full-stack developer with experience in Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, and Python. I have expertise in technologies like React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and various databases. I have worked on developing and deploying client web applications and AI chatbot UIs, and am proficient in system design concepts like API design and microservices. I am a Computer Science and Engineering student at Dehradun Institute of Technology.

title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed and deployed three comprehensive client web applications, showcasing proficiency in end-to-end full-stack development.
Designed and optimized end-to-end architecture with secure authentication, scalable databases, and REST APIs, improving overall app performance by 25%.

title: Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built and deployed 5+ responsive web applications and AI chatbot UIs using React.js, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, which resulted in a 30% improvement in load time.
Integrated advanced voice agents with ElevenLabs and Voiceflow, enhancing user interaction for over 1000 sessions.
Collaborated cross-functionally to ensure the on-time delivery of high-quality, scalable features for all projects.

title: Ping Panda - SaaS Event Monitoring Platform
description: Engineered a real-time SaaS monitoring system with Discord webhook, reducing incident response time by 35%. The platform features secure role-based subscriptions for over 50 users using Clerk auth and Stripe billing. The backend was optimized with Redis caching, which cut API latency by 40%. I also developed a responsive admin dashboard using Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

title: Reels Pro App - Short Video Sharing Platform
description: Developed a scalable short video-sharing platform (Instagram-style) using Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, supporting over 100 concurrent users with public/private video uploads and real-time updates. I integrated NextAuth, MongoDB, ImageKit, Cloudinary, and Redis for secure authentication, media handling, and scalability. A rate limiter was implemented to handle over 1000 requests per day, improving user retention by 20%.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: Created a responsive, animated portfolio using React.js, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion, showcasing over 10 projects, blogs, and freelance work. It includes a real-time contact form with Slack alerts and automated emails for instant client communication. A custom AI assistant was also added using the Gemini API to handle basic inquiries, boosting engagement by 25%.
